name: learning-platform
description: ระบบเรียนออนไลน์แบบครบวงจร

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name=learning-platform-frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:db: cd backend && npx wrangler d1 execute learning_platform --remote --file=schema.sql
